Text.Name: Talk_ShuShan
Text.Normal.1: What do you want to purchase?
Text.Like.0: Tell me your price. I'm listening.
Text.Submiss.0: See if there's anything you need? These are all of our rare collections.
Text.GiftLike.0: This isn't some common item. I like it.
Text.LowValueGift.0: Is this the rarest item you can offer? Gosh you guys are poor.
